articles.description: Tesla delivered 180,570 vehicles in the final three months of 2020. This was just 450 short of the half-million mark Elon Musk had set.
articles.content:
Tesla Inc. came within a hair of meeting its 500,000-vehicle goal for 2020, setting the stage for a new year in which its expanding in China and poised to open new factories in Texas and Germany.
